titleStmt.title: The fierie tryall of Gods saints as a counter-poyze to I.W. priest his English Martyrologie. And the detestable ends of popish traytors. ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. P[urfoot] [and T. Creed] for Arthur Iohnson,

notesStmt.note: "The fierie tryall of Gods saints" and "The detestable ends of popish traytors" each have separate title pages.
Appended, with caption title: A post-script to the wel affected reader.
Answers STC 25771: Wilson, John. The English martyrologe.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
